original_text: Do not do anything that will make God's Holy Spirit sad. God gave his Holy Spirit to you to show that you belong to him. As a result you know that God will make you completely free one day.
korean_text: 하나님의 성령을 근심하게 하지 말라 그 안에서 너희가 구원의 날까지 인치심을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: that will make God's Holy Spirit sad
God gave his Holy Spirit to you
to show that you belong to him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그에게 속한다는 것을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: that God will make you completely free
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신을 완전히 자유롭게 하실 것을
